articles.title: 4 maps predicting totals from Wednesday morning’s snowfall
articles.description:
"A much lighter snowfall is expected Wednesday as a clipper system passes by to our north."

The post 4 maps predicting totals from Wednesday morning’s snowfall appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Expect lighter snowfall in Boston on Wednesday, February 25, 2026.
Snow totals predicted to be minimal due to a passing clipper system.
Residents should prepare for reduced visibility and slippery roads during morning commute.

articles.title: $3m glass penthouse in the heart of Portland, Maine, is the most expensive condo in the city
articles.description:
The roof terrace has real, irrigated grass that is mowed once a week.

The post $3m glass penthouse in the heart of Portland, Maine, is the most expensive condo in the city appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Portland, Maine's $3 million penthouse is now the city's most expensive condo.
The penthouse features a roof terrace with irrigated grass mowed weekly.
This luxury listing may influence Boston's real estate market trends.
